message:
Hello Developers,
I have faced the problem of chaos in my hard disk and a messy of non organized files and folders.
So I uploaded a suggested folder structure to organize chaos in hard disk specially for developer.
Be patient it could take a time but your will gain an organized hard disk :)
story: Taha Emara shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: emara-geek/organize-chaos-in-hrad-disk
caption: github.com
description: organize-chaos-in-hrad-disk - Suggested folder structure to organize chaos in hard disk scpecially for developer
